text: MLB (known as MLB 2006 in PlayStation 2) is an Sports game, developed by 989 Sports published by SCEA, which was released in North America in 2005. == Other websites == * https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/psp/926259-mlb * https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/psp/926259-mlb/images * https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/ps2/925305-mlb-2006 * https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/ps2/925305-mlb-2006/images Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Sports video games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:2005 video games
title: MLB (2005 video game)
